sections.heading: Credit; amount; claim; approval; procedure
sections.text: (1) Any person incurring eligible expenditures may receive a nonrefundable credit against any income tax imposed by the Nebraska Revenue Act of 1967 or any tax imposed pursuant to sections 44-101 to 44-165, 77-907 to 77-918, or 77-3801 to 77-3807 for the ye
